title: Marián Chobot
text:
Marián Chobot (born 31 August 1999) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He currently plays for <a href="FC%20ViOn%20Zlat%C3%A9%20Moravce">Zlaté Moravce</a> and had previously featured for <a href="Slovakia%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">Slovakia U21</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Slovak%20Super%20Liga">Fortuna Liga</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Nitra">Nitra</a> on 28 July 2018 in a game against <a href="M%C5%A0K%20%C5%BDilina">Žilina</a>. Chobot played from start, but was replaced by <a href="Christi%C3%A1n%20Steinh%C3%BCbel">Christián Steinhübel</a> after 54 minutes. Žilina won the game 2-1.
